## Bins

```{r}

DonFeature(feature_c = "../data/clean/binCover.txt",
           donor = "DonA",
           cutoff_pres = 75,
           method = "Assembly") -> DonA_bins

DonFeature(feature_c = "../data/clean/binCover.txt",
           donor = "DonB",
           cutoff_pres = 75,
           method = "Assembly") -> DonB_bins

count_coloniz(DonA_bins, cutoff_pres = 75,
              mapfile = "../data/clean/mapfile.txt") %>%
  mutate(Donor= paste("DonorA")) -> DonA_bins_count

count_coloniz(DonB_bins, cutoff_pres = 75,
              mapfile = "../data/clean/mapfile.txt") %>%
  mutate(Donor= paste("DonorB"))-> DonB_bins_count


DonA_bins_count %>%
  rbind(DonB_bins_count) %>%
ggplot(
       aes(Group, n_coloniz)) +
  geom_boxplot() + geom_point() +
  facet_grid(Donor~Category, space = "free", scales = "free_x") +
  theme_bw()


```
